full_summary:
### 2024 Tender Announcement: Acquisition of Two Servomotors Leo II for Defence Purposes

#### Tender Id
W1985-24A010

#### Publication Date
March 6, 2024

#### Tender Closing Date
March 22, 2024 at 14:00 GMT

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) is issuing a Request for Proposal (RFP) on behalf of the Department of National Defence (DND). The purpose is to acquire two (2) Servomotors Leo II, which will be supplied, delivered, installed and commissioned in Montreal, Quebec, Canada.

#### Contract Details
* Expected Contract Start Date: April 30, 2024
* Expected Contract End Date: N/A (TBC)
* Procurement Category: Goods
* Notice Type: Request for Proposal
* Procurement Method: Competitive (Open Bidding)
* Selection Criteria: Lowest Price

#### Trade Agreements and Regions
* Trade Agreements: CFTA (Canadian Free Trade Agreement)
* Regions of Opportunity: None (Canada-wide tender)

#### Tender Resources
* Tender Notice URL: <https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/19008208?extsite=MTkwMDgyMDhfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==>
* Contact Information:
	+ Name: Ayassou, Adina (SPAC/PSPC)
	+ Email: adina.ayassou@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

#### UNSPSC Classification
* 26101300: Non-electric motors
* 39121000: Power conditioning equipment

Please note that the tender has been **Cancelled**. Any inquiries regarding this tender should be directed to the contact person listed above. The procurement notice and any related documents are available on the specified tender notice URL. 

Please ensure you comply with the tender requirements, including the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA) guidelines, to increase your chances of being selected for this project. This tender might be subject to cancellation or changes, or your application might incur other modifications. 

Once submissions are accepted, bidders must comply with the discussed setup as well as its compliance set ifs gained as well. 

Please ensure that you are familiar with IESC-approved terms as well.
